summary.span: 提供用于管理线程工作项队列的服务。

span.span: Provides services for managing the queue of work items for a thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 维护按优先顺序排列的特定线程的工作项队列。The maintains a prioritized queue of work items for a specific thread. 当创建上一个线程，它将成为唯一，您可能与线程关联即使关闭的情况下。When a is created on a thread, it becomes the only that can be associated with the thread, even if the is shut down. 如果尝试获取当前线程和一个不是与该线程关联将创建。If you attempt to get the for the current thread and a is not associated with the thread, a will be created. 一个在创建时还创建。A is also created when you create a . 如果您创建上后台线程，请确保在退出该线程之前关闭调度程序。If you create a on a background thread, be sure to shut down the dispatcher before exiting the thread. 如果关闭的情况下，无法重启。If a is shut down, it cannot be restarted. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]、 一个只能由访问与其相关联。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], a can only be accessed by the it is associated with. 例如，在后台线程不能更新的内容相关联上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。For example, a background thread cannot update the contents of a that is associated with the on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 为了使后台线程来访问的属性，在后台线程必须将工作委托给与关联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。In order for the background thread to access the property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 这通过使用实现或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步和是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 该操作将添加到的队列在指定。The operation is added to the queue of the at the specified . 如果上调用的已关闭的情况下，返回的 status 属性设置为。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to . 上的方法的所有，除，是自由线程。All of the methods on , with the exception of , are free-threaded. 从派生的对象具有线程关联。Objects that derive from have thread affinity. 从派生的对象是自由线程时被冻结。Objects that derive from are free-threaded when they are frozen. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何将放置到上的一个操作。The following example shows how to place an operation onto a . 此示例的完整源代码，请参阅[单线程应用程序使用长时间运行计算示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038)。For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038). 首先，创建委托接受任何参数。First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberinit)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberinit)] 下一步，调用。Next, is called. 此调用采用两个参数： 的优先级设置为，和回调，通过该委托的实例传入`NextPrimeDelegate`。This call to takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to , and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)]

summary.span: 在与 关联的线程上异步执行委托。

span.span: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread the is associated with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，只有创建的线程才能访问该对象。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，从主 UI 线程运行的后台线程不能更新的内容UI 线程上创建。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 为了使后台线程将访问的内容属性的，后台线程必须将工作委托给与 UI 线程关联。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 这通过使用实现或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步和是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 该操作将添加到的事件队列在指定。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 是异步的;因此，控件立即返回到调用对象后调用它。 is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called. 返回可用于的委托时委托是在事件队列交互的对象。 returns a object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue. 返回对象可以采用几种方法与指定的委托，如交互：The object returned by can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as: - 更改委托的因为它处于挂起状态执行事件队列中。Changing the of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue. - 从事件队列中删除委托。Removing the delegate from the event queue. - 等待要返回的委托。Waiting for the delegate to return. - 获取值，则在委托返回后它会执行。Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed. 如果多个调用都是在同一个，他们将进行了调用的顺序执行。If multiple calls are made at the same , they will be executed in the order the calls were made. 如果上调用的已关闭的情况下，返回的 status 属性设置为。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 禁用调度程序处理是一种高级的方法，用于排除不相关的重新进入的可能性。Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy. 禁用处理的影响是，如下所示：The effects of disabling processing are as follows: - CLR 锁不会在内部发送的信息。CLR locks will not pump messages internally. - 不允许对象推送。 objects are not allowed to be pushed. - 不允许消息处理。Message processing is not permitted. 结构的返回被调用时可用于重新启用调度程序处理。The structure that returns when it is called can be used to re-enable dispatcher processing. 调用上结构将重新启用处理。Calling on the structure re-enables processing. 仅在线程上调用与相关联。 can only be called on the thread the is associated with. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何禁用调度程序处理和重新启用调度程序处理。The following example shows how to disable dispatcher processing and re-enable dispatcher processing. 在中称为**使用**语句。 is called in a **using** statement. 返回结构，它用于与对象被释放**使用**块结束。 returns a structure that is used as the object to be disposed when the **using** block finishes. 当上调用结构，重新启用，调度程序处理。When is called on the structure, dispatcher processing is re-enabled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，只有创建的线程才能访问该对象。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，从主 UI 线程运行的后台线程不能更新的内容UI 线程上创建。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 为了使后台线程将访问的内容属性的，后台线程必须将工作委托给与 UI 线程关联。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 这通过使用实现或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步和是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 该操作将添加到的事件队列在指定。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 是一项同步操作;因此，控件不会返回对调用对象直到回调返回后。 is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.

Public Sub InvokeShutdown ()
public: void InvokeShutdown();

summary.span: 同步启动 的关闭过程。

span.span: Initiates the shutdown process of the synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求不受限制的 UI 权限。 demands unrestricted UI Permissions. 当若要关闭的情况下，将启动引发事件和设置为`true`。When the starts to shut down, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 不会关闭完全展开事件队列之前。The does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds. 当调度程序完成后关闭，请引发事件和属性设置为`true`。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 关闭流程开始之后，所有挂起的工作队列中的项而被中止。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

span.span: for shutting down the dispatcher.

summary.span: 进入执行循环。

span.span: Enters an execute loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个表示处理挂起的工作项的循环。A represents a loop that processes pending work items. 调度程序处理循环中的工作项队列。The Dispatcher processes the work item queue in a loop. 循环称为帧。The loop is referred to as a frame. 初始循环通常通过调用来启动应用程序。The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling . 将进入一个循环由参数表示`frame`。 enters a loop represented by the parameter `frame`. 在循环中，每次迭代将检查属性上的类，以确定是否应继续循环，或者如果它应该停止。At each iteration of the loop, the will check the property on the class to determine whether the loop should continue or if it should stop. 允许属性显式设置，并且它遵循属性上的。 allows for the property to be set explicitly and it respects the property on the . 这意味着当开始，若要关闭的情况下，使用默认的帧实现将退出，这样所有嵌套的帧以退出。This means when the starts to shut down, frames that use the default implementation will exit, which enables all nested frames to exit. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来获取类似结果作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理循环中的事件队列。The processes the event queue in a loop. 循环称为帧。The loop is referred to as a frame. 初始循环通常通过调用来启动应用程序。The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling . 主执行帧将继续执行，直至已关闭。The main execution frame will continue until the is shutdown.

summary.span: 当 完成关闭时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时的关闭进程启动时，引发事件并设置为`true`。When the shutdown process of a is started, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 事件队列展开之前完全没有关闭。The does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds. 当调度程序完成后关闭，请引发事件和属性设置为`true`。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 关闭流程开始之后，所有挂起的工作队列中的项而被中止。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

span.span: Occurs when the begins to shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时的关闭进程启动时，引发事件并设置为`true`。When the shutdown process of a is started, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 事件队列展开之前完全没有关闭。The does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds. 当调度程序完成后关闭，请引发事件和属性设置为`true`。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 关闭流程开始之后，所有挂起的工作队列中的项而被中止。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

summary.span: 在通过 或 执行委托的过程中，如果引发线程异常且未能捕获该异常，则发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过委托的执行期间引发的异常时，将引发此事件或是未捕获。This event is raised when an exception that was thrown during execution of a delegate by way of or is uncaught. 一个处理程序可以将标记该异常为已处理，这会阻止的内部异常处理程序被调用。A handler can mark the exception as handled, which will prevent the internal exception handler from being called. 此事件的事件处理程序必须谨慎来避免创建辅助异常并发现出现任何的编写。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建议以避免分配内存或执行的任何资源密集型操作的处理程序中。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供了一种不会引发事件。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 首先，引发事件; 如果上设置为`false`，则不会引发事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

span.span: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of or when in the filter stage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过委托的执行期间引发的异常的筛选器阶段引发此事件或且未能捕获。This event is raised during the filter stage for an exception that is raised during execution of a delegate by way of or and is uncaught. 不在此点 （首次异常） 展开调用堆栈。The call stack is not unwound at this point (first-chance exception). 此事件的事件处理程序必须谨慎来避免创建辅助异常并发现出现任何的编写。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建议以避免分配内存或执行的任何资源密集型操作的处理程序中。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供了一种不会引发事件。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 首先，引发事件; 如果上设置为`false`，则不会引发事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有线程创建在可访问。Only the thread the is created on may access the . 此方法是公共的则因此，任何线程可以检查以查看是否有权访问。This method is public; therefore, any thread can check to see whether it has access to the . 之间的差异并是返回一个布尔值，如果调用线程不具有访问和将引发异常。The difference between and is returns a Boolean if the calling thread does not have access to the and throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用来确定线程是否具有访问该线程的上创建。The following example uses to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a was created on. 该方法采用一个对象作为参数，将其强制转换为。The method takes an object as an argument, which is cast to a . 方法的调用以验证是否可以访问该线程。The method on the of the is called to verify access to the thread. 如果调用线程可以访问，则只需访问的成员更新。If the calling thread has access to the , the is updated by just accessing the members of the . 如果调用线程不具有访问权限，引发。If the calling thread does not have access, an is thrown. 此示例中捕获异常并推送一个委托，它接受作为参数，拖到的。This example catches the exception and pushes a delegate, which accepts a as an argument, onto the of the . 这将执行更新的工作。This will do the work of updating the . span.span: An awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法可暂时释放给当前计划程序执行控制，以便它可以执行其他工作，就像处理其他事件。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 使用`await`，或`Await`在 Visual Basic 中，运算符的返回值将控制返回给当前计划程序。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 使用此方法，如果想要使您的应用程序有机会处理事件，而你应用的运行状况很多在 UI 线程上工作。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，您可以更新控件的运行时间较长循环中使用此方法。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control. 此方法相当于调用方法并传入。This method is equivalent to calling the method and passing in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法可暂时释放给当前计划程序执行控制，以便它可以执行其他工作，就像处理其他事件。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 使用`await`，或`Await`在 Visual Basic 中，运算符的返回值将控制返回给当前计划程序。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 使用此方法，如果想要使您的应用程序有机会处理事件，而你应用的运行状况很多在 UI 线程上工作。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，您可以更新控件的运行时间较长循环中使用此方法。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
